dynaForm.name: file
dynaForm.PME_VALIDATE_NAME: SELECT XMLNODE_NAME, TYPE FROM dynaForm WHERE XMLNODE_NAME = @@PME_XMLNODE_NAME
dynaForm.PME_INPUT: SELECT INPUT_DOCUMENT.INP_DOC_UID, CONTENT.CON_VALUE AS VALUE FROM INPUT_DOCUMENT LEFT JOIN CONTENT ON (INPUT_DOCUMENT.INP_DOC_UID=CONTENT.CON_ID AND CONTENT.CON_CATEGORY='INP_DOC_TITLE' AND CONTENT.CON_LANG='en') WHERE INPUT_DOCUMENT.PRO_UID = @@PME_PRO_UID ORDER BY CONTENT.CON_VALUE InputNoneInputNone
